#   op | proc | src | tag | id
#   op | proc | req
#   op | proc | group | id
#   op | proc | root | group | id
#

r 0 -1 1 0
w 0 0
r 0 1 -1 2
w 0 2
b 0 1 4
r 0 -1 1 5
w 0 5
bd 0 1 4 7
sc 0 2 5 8

s 1 0 1 0
w 1 0
r 1 2 2 2
w 1 2
b 1 1 4
s 1 0 3 5
w 1 5
bd 1 1 4 7
ga 1 1 4 8
sc 1 2 5 8

s 2 1 2 0
w 2 0
s 2 0 1 2
w 2 2
b 2 1 4
ga 2 1 4 5
sc 2 2 5 8
